alert.note: Alert for Spencer (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 12:16PM EST until March 05 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Owensboro, Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown and Golconda. .Rainfall over the last 10 days will continue to cause rises on the Ohio River, with expected crests mid to late next week. For the Ohio River...including Owensboro, Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Golconda...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Owensboro. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:04 AM CST Saturday the stage was 39.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 40.5 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
